body: Holy fuck I've never cried as much before. I still am.
This is such a beautiful manga

Read this in Chinese, can sum up a bit of it.

Basically this guy wanted to commit suicide by invoking a Succubus to take his soul before he dies. Anyways she felt sorry for him and felt in love with him so she turned into a real human and telling him not to kill himself. The End.
Please translate it to english it looks like an amazing piece
